title: Letting Go
alt: At least I never gave her the root password.
transcript:
[Cueball is holding a picture of himself and Megan in a heart; it has been ripped down the middle, separating the two people.][Cueball sits at computer, looking at the picture.][It is night. Cueball still sits at the computer with the picture in front of him and his head drooped.][It is day again. Cueball types on the computer.]
Text from computer: [emailÂ protected]:~# userdel megan
